Today, North Yorks is seeing poor conditions with a fresh 27 mph WNW wind and 5 ft @8s N swell, making it blown out across the board. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @7s NNE with a similar fresh 26 mph S wind, keeping things messy. On the day after, conditions remain poor with 3 ft @9s NE swell and 19 mph SSW winds. Best: none.
